description: Otome Zakura Japanese Maple is a beautiful tree with springtime pink and white flowers, delicate green leaves in the summer, and fiery scarlet red foliage in the fall. It engages the garden with multi-sensorial beauty, providing breathtaking visuals and a pleasing scent. It's an easy to grow and maintain tree that doesn't require much pruning or other upkeep and can thrive in many different soil conditions. It's an especially lovely addition to a Japanese style garden and is sure to draw attention with its beauty and grandeur.
